headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Ph.D. Student Ross Miller (Physics '22) is one of the Library's ThinkOpen Fellows using Open Educational Resources (OER) to help save students money.

headline: Library Workshops!
paragraph: The library hosts workshops every week. Join us to learn about tools that impact your research or kick start your projects!

headline: Featured Resource: Safari
paragraph: Access thousands of ebooks, videos, and courses in tech, business, communications, design, management, and more with Safari Books Online.

headline: Visit The MILL
paragraph: Join us for workshops every week at the library's Making, Innovating, and Learning Laboratory (MILL)

image-alt: Participants in the CDIL summer symposium 2017
headline: Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning
paragraph: The only center of its kind in Idaho, CDIL provides digital scholarship research and learning opportunities on campus for faculty and students.
